Functions
Add_Film
void Add_Film(
Film_Infos *FILM,
char *Owner
)

  • It adds a new Film by writing it into The Film database.

  • It specifies who the Film belongs to

Parameters
FILM
Film_Infos*

The structure of the Films which will be holding the infos.

Owner
char*

The name of the member that possess the film , generally it will be the logged-in member

See Also

Film_Infos_Input

Modify_Or_Delete_Film
void Modify_Or_Delete_Film(
char Delete_Modify,
Film_Infos *FILM
)

This functions is used on Double mode especially to interact with the Film  Database:

Delete Mode

It deletes a specific Film  from the The Database.

Modification Mode

It modifies a specific Film  in the Database

Parameters
Delete_Modify
char

It denotes The mode which will the function be used in i.e: "D" for delete /"M" for modify

FILM
Film_Infos*

The structure of the Films which will be holding the infos.

See Also

CHANGE_OR_DELETE_FILM_DATABASE_LINE / Film_Infos_Input / SEARCH_ID

Display_Film_By_Type
void Display_Film_By_Type(
Film_Infos *FILM
)

This functions is used to display the Films by type :

It uses Display_Specific_Type_Film to display each type apart.
